item.title: What !nanni's father told him (what to eat and avoid)
item.summary: !nanni's father (|umma-tchi-gua) told him what to eat and what to avoid. !nanni's father had been instructed by his father (Karu) in the same matters.
item.comments: 1) See also Food eaten by the !kun and Elephants (eating their hearts) and Food eaten by the !kun and Things eaten by the !kun and Animals eaten by the !kun, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4
item.author: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
